src:
Traktor se je prevrnil, voznik padel iz kabine
Nastalo je tri tisoč evrov materialne škode.
03 Nov 2019, 13:20 by A. L.
LONČAROVCI – V soboto ob 14.34 so policiste PU Murska Soboto obvestili, da se je zunaj naselja Lončarovci zgodila nesreča pri delu.Ugotovili so, da je med delom na njivi voznik, ko se je traktor prevrnil, padel iz kabine in se pri tem lažje poškodoval.Nastalo je 3.000 evrov materialne škode, so zapisali v poročilu.
text:
The tractor rolled over, the driver fell out of the cab
Three thousand euros of pecuniary damage were incurred.
03 Nov 2019, 12:20 by A.L.
LONCAROVCI - Police at Murska Sobota Police Station on Saturday reported at 14.34 that an accident at work occurred outside the village of Loncarovci. . 3,000 euros in material damage have been reported, the report said.
